      • initDataSerializableInputAndSkipTheHeader

        public ObjectDataInput initDataSerializableInputAndSkipTheHeader(Data data)
                                                          throws IOException
        Init the ObjectDataInput for the given Data skipping the serialization header-bytes and navigating to the position from where the readData() starts reading the object fields.
        Parameters:
        data - data to initialize the ObjectDataInput with.
        Returns:
        the initialized ObjectDataInput without the header.
        Throws:
        IOException
